document.body:
Skip to content
products and services services | merchant account services
What is your most likely method for accepting credit cards? Swiped cards at a retail store, mobile business or trade show Swiped cards at a restaurant Swiped cards at a fast food restaurant or coffee shop Manually entered (knuckle-buster) by phone, mail order, e-commerce, at a mobile business or a trade show Swiped cards at a Supermarket Other How much do you currently accept, or do you anticipate accepting, in monthly card transactions? Under $5,000/month $5,000 - $10,000/month $10,000 - $20,000/month $20,000 - $40,000/month $40,000 - $100,000/month Over $100,000/month What is the expected average individual charge amount? $1 - $15/transaction $15 - $50/transaction $50 - $100/transaction $100 - $500/transaction $500 - $1,000/transaction $1,000+/transaction Business Name(DBA) Products/Services Description Contact Name (First, Last) Mr. Mrs. Ms. Dr. Rev.
